price: 59. Yeysan moodinna gaalada inay hormareen (macnaha waa ha ka cabsan ku hormarkooda heerarka adduun ama hubka). Hubaal (Alle) kama baxsan karaan (wuuna soo qaban meelay gaaraanba).
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَبَقُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُعۡجِزُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū sabaqū innahum lā yuʿ'jizūna
